channel.title: Lag be gone
channel.description: ok when i was an active member and did my first release there was a tut that got blocked for being a 5 min tut but was actually extremely helpful.. pretty much the guy made it so your server doesn't save every 5 seconds.. i have unfortunently forgotten how to do this because it was probably a year ago and i just don't remember that does anybody know what to do or have a tut for it?

item.title: Lag be gone
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

True. He could make it save at larger intervals.

LOL AT YOUR SIGGY. (THE LAST PART.)

Read full topic

item.title: Lag be gone
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

This would have a major flaw, say your server crashed, people don’t use the logout packet then because the connection is closed before they have a chance. So their char wouldn’t save.

Read full topic

item.title: Lag be gone
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Add your saving methods to the logout packet and the initialize() method. Remove all the other ones, unless they are truly needed.

Read full topic

item.title: Lag be gone
item.dc:creator: @kingofnone kingofnone
item.description:
@kingofnone wrote:

mmkay i will try that…

Read full topic

item.title: Lag be gone
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

kingofnone:

wouldn’t that make it not save at all then…??? i think i tried that and it just didn’t save…

Remove the autosave methods.

item.title: Lag be gone
item.dc:creator: @kingofnone kingofnone
item.description:
@kingofnone wrote:

thats not what i am after… i can do that… i want it to save when i log out and it auto saves when you log in anyways… thats it…

Read full topic

item.title: Lag be gone
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Then increase the time between each save in your save methods.

Read full topic

item.title: Lag be gone
item.dc:creator: @kingofnone kingofnone
item.description:
@kingofnone wrote:

you aren’t understanding what i am saying i said nothing of a “program” nor removing lag… just letting it die down a bit what the guy taught us to do was to make it so our server did not auto save every 5 seconds for each file… which really did take alot of lag away… what it was is he had it auto save when we logged in and out but i have no clue were to start on making that myself so in otherwords

blah blah blah as succesfully saved!
(5seconds later)
blah blah blah as succesfully saved!
(10seconds)
blah blah blah as succesfully saved!
…
blah blah blah as succesfully saved!

it would be like this
blah blah has succesfully logged in {logging in
blah blah has succesfully saved {logging in

blah blah has succesfully saved {logging off
blah blah has succesfully logged out{logging off

so if you are running a server of 25 people that can get hectic if your autosaving every 5 seconds…

Read full topic

item.title: Lag be gone
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Lag can’t just be taken away with a program, it depends on a lot more than that. Sure, there have been programs that ‘remove’ a bit of lag, but not all of it.

Read full topic
